Citation_Information.description: This document provides a comprehensive description of the LADEE SPICE kernel archive containing observation geometry and other ancillary data in the form of SPICE System kernel files for the LADEE spacecraft and its instruments and targets. It describes the archive directory structure, kernels included in the archive, their naming conventions, and provides pointers to the SPICE software and documentation.

Document.description: This document provides a comprehensive description of the LADEE SPICE kernel archive containing observation geometry and other ancillary data in the form of SPICE System kernel files for the LADEE spacecraft and its instruments and targets.
